name: Slither 3D - Super Snake io Free Skin Edition
name_original: Slither 3D - Super Snake io Free Skin Edition
description:
*** FREE SLITHER SNAKE GAME IN 3D WITH OFFLINE MODE ***
Download, Unlock and Choose Your Skin and Start Slithering in 3D! Be the longest snake, every day! If your head hits another player, you will drop all the food what you have eaten. Use double tap to boost and intersect your friend's way!

Features:
> AI Bot in offline mode
> 2D and 3D mode!
> Multiplayer mode and Private servers
> Colourful Skins
> Balanced gameplay!
> Joystick or Swipe control

Download free and start slithering! Good luck!
